    • Method Detail

      • Query

        public static java.lang.String Query​(java.lang.String recordToUpdate,
                                     java.lang.String pubId,
                                     java.lang.String pubName,
                                     java.lang.String pubPostcode,
                                     java.lang.String pubAddress1,
                                     java.lang.String pubAddress2,
                                     java.lang.String pubAddress3,
                                     java.lang.String pubTown,
                                     java.lang.String pubCounty)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method generates SQL For a publisher update. It generates the query which it then passes to the database connection manager DbConnection.Manager. Results then returned to UpdatePublisherController.btnPublisherUpdAction method for the Update publisher Interface. Data validity checking handled before execution of UPDATE.
        Parameters:
        recordToUpdate - The ID of the record to update
        pubId - New Publisher ID
        pubName - New Publisher name
        pubPostcode - New postcode
        pubAddress1 - New address line 1
        pubAddress2 - New address line 2
        pubAddress3 - New address line 3
        pubTown - New Town address
        pubCounty - New county address
        Returns:
        String result of SQL transaction.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if data file cannot be accessed by
